name: Abomi Nation (Kickstarter Alpha)
description:
Abomi Nation is a roguelike monster-collecting RPG inspired by Pokémon's "Nuzlocke" Hard Mode. Each new run will give you different Abomis, different areas, and a whole new Abomi Nation for you to explore!

Abomi Nation is a land where no traditional animals live – only some supernatural abominations known as Abomis. Something mysterious has happened throughout its land, and all the native creatures have turned savage against people. Some humans, though, realized that when Abomis are raised from birth, they can be taught to only fight in self-defense. So, these Abomi Wranglers try to raise a team powerful enough to travel to the heart of Abomi Nation, where they can find out more about its mysterious past.

Abomi Nation is currently going through a Kickstarter to get its funding. If you'd like to see the game released within this century, then be sure to leave a pledge so that the developer can go full-time!

You can send any bug reports to orangepylongames@gmail.com!

Controls:

Xbox 360/Xbox One Controller:

(PlayStation controllers are also supported!)

Left Stick: Move

A: Select/Confirm

B: Back/Run

X: Switch moves from your stat screen

Y/Start: Pause/Show HP in-battle

LT/RT: Zoom in and out/Rotate three Abomis in-battle

Keyboard:

WASD/Arrow Keys: Move

O: Select/Confirm

P: Back/Run

I: Switch moves from your stat screen

Enter: Pause/Show HP in-battle

9/0: Zoom in and out/Rotate three Abomis in-battle

ESC: Toggle fullscreen
